description: I have been using openscad for 3 years for all my 3d printing projects. it has great documentation making it easy for any programmer to get up to speed on how to use it and many other people have reliesed source code for extensions that make doings many of the things a normal cad program would do fairly straight forward. Object oriented-ish so you can keep all your extensions in separate files from your actual projects. very easy to use if your already familiar with c.

Had a problem with it. it opened the models fine but had no top menu. a second window opened but it was frozen. I guess is a driver issue but I don;t expect that from a stable version. running ubuntu 18.04. maybe I was unlucky.

Pour le langage de programmation : il suffit juste de prendre le temps de l'apprendre et de le bosser un peu pour bien le maîtriser.
Je n'ai que de bonne choses à dire sur ce logiciel, à part que l'icône dans unity d'Ubuntu n'apparaît jamais même en désinstallant et réinstallant nightly. Est-ce que ce problème pourrait être corrigé au plus vite svp ?
summary: Langage de prog./script efficace mais assez simple
